materials.raw_text: B: 60 g, Co: 30 g, Er: 10 g, Si: 20 g, Tb: 5 g

sourcing.instructions: B: Chemical supply stores or online chemical suppliers; Co: Metal suppliers or specialty chemical shops; Er: Rare earth element suppliers; Si: Electronics suppliers or chemical suppliers; Tb: Rare earth element suppliers.
steps: B: Chemical supply stores or online chemical suppliers; Co: Metal suppliers or specialty chemical shops; Er: Rare earth element suppliers; Si: Electronics suppliers or chemical suppliers; Tb: Rare earth element suppliers.

1. Weigh each ingredient accurately using a digital scale. 2. In a clean, dry mixing container, add 60 g of B. 3. Add 30 g of Co to the container. 4. Add 10 g of Er. 5. Introduce 20 g of Si. 6. Finally, add 5 g of Tb. 7. Mix thoroughly using a spatula or mechanical mixer until homogeneous.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Weigh each ingredient accurately using a digital scale. 2. In a clean, dry mixing container, add 60 g of B. 3. Add 30 g of Co to the container. 4. Add 10 g of Er. 5. Introduce 20 g of Si. 6. Finally, add 5 g of Tb. 7. Mix thoroughly using a spatula or mechanical mixer until homogeneous.

steps: 1. Transfer the mixed material into a crucible. 2. Place the crucible in a furnace. 3. Heat to 1200°C and maintain for 2 hours to ensure complete reaction of the materials.
heating.raw_text: 1. Transfer the mixed material into a crucible. 2. Place the crucible in a furnace. 3. Heat to 1200°C and maintain for 2 hours to ensure complete reaction of the materials.

steps: 1. Turn off the furnace and allow it to cool to room temperature naturally (approximately 4-6 hours). 2. Avoid rapid cooling to prevent cracking.
cooling.raw_text: 1. Turn off the furnace and allow it to cool to room temperature naturally (approximately 4-6 hours). 2. Avoid rapid cooling to prevent cracking.

steps: 1. Once cooled, carefully remove the solid sample from the crucible. 2. Use a fine-grit sandpaper to smooth any rough edges. 3. If necessary, apply a sealing agent to enhance durability. 4. Allow the sealant to cure as per the manufacturer's instructions.
